description:
Itâ€™s the mission of InnoVites to provide cable manufacturing companies with enterprise applications that help them maximize their business performance.
We achieve this by developing and delivering innovative, affordable and high-quality enterprise applications that are tailored to the needs of cable manufacturing companies.
InnoVites builds applications as an extension to the innovative, mature and user-friendly Microsoft Dynamics AX software.

We believe that a software solution that has a natural fit with a cable manufacturing company will deliver its full potential and unleash enormous business value to our customers in the cable industry.
